Physical.Name: Physical
Physical.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Physical</color> attacks to trigger <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Physical DMG and apply the <color=#f29e38ff>Bleed</color> effect, dealing Physical DoT.

Fire.Name: Fire
Fire.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Fire</color> attacks to trigger <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Fire DMG and apply the <color=#f29e38ff>Burn</color> effect, dealing Fire DoT.

Ice.Name: Ice
Ice.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Ice</color> attacks to trigger <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Ice DMG and <color=#f29e38ff>Freeze</color> the target, immobilizing the enemy and dealing Additional Ice DMG.

Thunder.Name: Lightning
Thunder.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Lightning</color> attacks to trigger <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Lightning DMG and apply the <color=#f29e38ff>Shock</color> effect, dealing Lightning DoT.

Wind.Name: Wind
Wind.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Wind</color> attacks to trigger <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Wind DMG and apply the <color=#f29e38ff>Wind Shear</color> effect, dealing Wind DoT.

Quantum.Name: Quantum
Quantum.Description: Using <color=#f29e38ff>Quantum</color> attacks to inflict <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> will deal Quantum DMG and cause <color=#f29e38ff>Entanglement</color>, delaying the enemy's action and dealing Additional Quantum DMG to the affected enemy at the start of the next turn. When the enemy is hit, this extra DMG will increase.

Imaginary.Name: Imaginary
Imaginary.Description: When using an <color=#f29e38ff>Imaginary</color> attack to inflict <color=#f29e38ff>Weakness Break</color> on target enemy, the attack will deal Imaginary DMG and additionally inflicts <color=#f29e38ff>Imprisonment</color>. <color=#f29e38ff>Imprisoned</color> enemies suffer from delayed actions and SPD reduction.
